publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1315 Donald Gorrie: Local Archives and the Freedom of Information Act-That the Parliament is concerned at the lack of investment in local authority and other local archives, resulting in the loss of parts of Scottish recorded heritage, and the resulting inability of some archives to respond as they would wish to requests under the Freedom of Information (Scotland) Act 2002.
S2M-1315 Local Archives and the Freedom of Information Act (lodged on 14 May 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1315 Local Archives and the Freedom of Information Act (lodged on 14 May 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-1315 Local Archives and the Freedom of Information Act (lodged on 14 May 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1315 Local Archives and the Freedom of Information Act (lodged on 14 May 2004) Elaine Smith*
